pets.name: Kitty
pets.description:
The classic kitty will hang out with you and snuggle when you're laying down!
They'll give you passive rewards.

pets.name: Puppy
pets.description:
The classic puppy will demand constant attention and play, make sure to give them treats!
They'll give you simple tasks to earn rewards.

pets.name: Bunny
pets.description:
This little guy will hop around without a care in the world, gathering tons of veggies!
They'll automatically collect some of your items.

pets.name: Mouse
pets.description:
This tiny mouse will skitter around to cause chaos in every nook and cranny they can find!
They'll randomly prevent an enemy from attacking for a turn.

pets.name: Bat
pets.description:
This flying puppy will proudly accompany your ship, using thier echolocation to help navigate!
They'll increase the chances of a "choice" encounter.

pets.name: Shark
pets.description:
This ferocious predator will seek out nearby battles using their sensitive smell!
They'll increase the chances of a "combat" encounter.

pets.name: Owl
pets.description:
This nocturnal hunter will use its spinning head to scout out particular spots!
They'll increase the chances of a "boost" encounter.

pets.name: Bear
pets.description:
The bear will give you constant protection and a fuzzy friend to cozy up with!
They'll help you in battles.

pets.name: Cow
pets.description:
The cow will be a close ally and help you when you're most in need!
After every combat your weapons will be healed slightly.

pets.name: Fairy
pets.description:
This elegant angel will bless your exploration to be a success!
At the start of every run you are granted a powerup.
